basics.name: Vincent Raerek
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: I'm a programmer interested in the application of statistical learning and AI to attention and decision-making. I have over six yearsâ€™ combined experience in software engineering and machine learning, including three in industry. I specialize in data ETL, database management, data visualization and statistical analysis, including machine learning.

work.summary: Geolocation platform providing location and event data to emergency services.
highlights: Developed ML pipelines to classify text, images, and audio for use in large-scale location-based data aggregation service
Designed and developed multi-source data ingestion system for performing real time classification and predictions
Performed NLP processing of data from emergency service and social media updates to classify and geolocate messages
Developed metrics dashboard for visually communicating live data pipeline status and performance metrics

work.summary: Women's lifestyle media covering pop culture and entertainment
highlights: Designed and developed full stack analytics product (TrendRank) from conception to launch using a combination of Python, mySQL and Apache Spark
Contributed to PHP backend and Javascript frontend of large-scale media blog
Using Apache Spark, designed and implemented pipeline for ETL operations and statistical modeling and analysis (machine learning) of large-scale media data
Wrote Python back end server architecture using Flask microframework
Developed NLP tool for classifying editorial content by topic and market vertical
Wrote and executed science and technology programming for hundreds of teen students, which included soldering and constructing a neural signal amplifier for experimenting on live invertebrates
Built automated calendar app in Javascript for 2014 summer reading program
Developed programs using MNE-Python analysis suite and R to analyze electrical patterns in brain data

work.position: VLS Technician, Gunner's Mate, 3rd Class Petty Officer
